line_1: And when the Day had clos'd his e'e,
And when the Day had clos'd his e'e,
line_2: The lee-lang day had tir'd me;

line_1: And when the Day had clos'd his e'e,
line_2: Ben i' the Spence, right pensivelie,

line_1: In youthfu' bloom, Love sparkling in her e'e,
In youthfu' bloom, Love sparkling in her e'e,
line_2: To help her Parents dear, if they in hardship be.

line_1: But Och! I backward cast my e'e,
line_2: Still, thou art blest, compar'd wi' me!

line_1: But Och! I backward cast my e'e,
But Och! I backward cast my e'e,
line_2: An' forward, tho' I canna see,

line_1: Jean slips in twa, wi' tentie e'e;
line_2: But this is Jock, an' this is me,
